scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross. To his left stands the Virgin Mary, draped in a blue mantle and with her hands clasped in prayer. To his right is a figure in a red robe, likely Saint John the Evangelist, looking upwards towards Christ. The background is a decorative textile pattern of dark brown with gold and white motifs. The figures are set against a pale ground, suggesting an outdoor location. The scene is framed by decorative borders.
